pr_title: FISH-206 @RolesAllowed annotation in method prevents unauthenticated calls to other methods in remote EJB

timeline.bodyText: Rebase to a new snapshot version, please ... now it is 5.2020.7-SNAPSHOT

timeline.message:
FISH-206 Add unauthorised csiv2 ior descriptor if an unchecked method is
present

Signed-off-by: Andrew Pielage <pandrex247@hotmail.com>

FISH-206 Copyright, actually enable servlet test, and add additional
test to ensure a protected EJB cannot be looked up.

Signed-off-by: Andrew Pielage <pandrex247@hotmail.com>

FISH-206 Add explanative comment

Signed-off-by: Andrew Pielage <pandrex247@hotmail.com>

FISH-206 Adjust parent version

Signed-off-by: Andrew Pielage <pandrex247@hotmail.com>

FISH-206 Missed copyright update

Signed-off-by: Andrew Pielage <andrew.pielage@payara.fish>

FISH-206 Update parent pom versions

Signed-off-by: Andrew Pielage <andrew.pielage@payara.fish>

FISH-206 Update parent pom versions

Signed-off-by: Andrew Pielage <andrew.pielage@payara.fish>
